title: Stuck at "Processing bodies... from=18723038 to=18746382"
body:

erigon --datadir=/home/ubuntu/rpc/erigon/ --authrpc.jwtsecret=/home/ubuntu/rpc/erigon/jwtsecret --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --http.vhosts '*' --http.port 8545 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.corsdomain '*' --http.api 'eth,net,web3,trace' --prune htrc --etl.bufferSize 1024mb --maxpeers 500 --internalcl

Consensus Layer:

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network: mainnet
